
Two careless agents generated public keys with a shared prime. Recover the secret from 2829371944227399387681832630652229724757613056081228273714741839190300067270342885382159004691740345116185919403897402091293063786262401199922697507879207 encrypted with their respective RSA public keys.


The flag format is flag{...}
n=9348266555141766979885175926822562441269431534818521580487599792823040564743984396707977289603166942688885928694134547503184026383685084863562711572850243, n2=6882305114908769348097182278721082926563823066934434041837091536220047830010448019749562393636719629689900334512766709314872579765934989311361431581033937, e=5797168074262181704493486119522092715451627765977607937703696726413283056904165312925444422840875897585093255546185714466368527674584290597603886519210149

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{kmvgppd7}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2829371944227399387681832630652229724757613056081228273714741839190300067270342885382159004691740345116185919403897402091293063786262401199922697507879207
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9348266555141766979885175926822562441269431534818521580487599792823040564743984396707977289603166942688885928694134547503184026383685084863562711572850243, n2=6882305114908769348097182278721082926563823066934434041837091536220047830010448019749562393636719629689900334512766709314872579765934989311361431581033937, e=5797168074262181704493486119522092715451627765977607937703696726413283056904165312925444422840875897585093255546185714466368527674584290597603886519210149
extra_info: p=107830896457136926674007406530671049183183258662152471600330115942195737579737, q=86693766464769475868830114628922751395343932833142175610982450076345663356539, q2=63824982829893325306491522533138650927322658520336150603917706579475158876601, φ(n)=9348266555141766979885175926822562441269431534818521580487599792823040564743789872045055383200624105167726334893556020311688731736473772297544170171913968, φ(n2)=6882305114908769348097182278721082926563823066934434041837091536220047830010276363870275363384739130760836524812656203397690091143730741488839760684577600
